Html:
I am wondering if anyone has used Prism to host XNA content.  If so, are their any compatibility issues with XNA 4.0 beta?

Thanks in advance.

Jeremy

Hi Jeremy,

There is no guidance on this topic in Prism out-of-the-box. But I think that you can find interesting the following blog post: Building the Laser Graffiti System

I am not aware how this application integrates XNA and Prism, but you could download the code from here.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
